snippet: With little mystery surrounding how the first two picks would go in Thursday's NBA draft, the Celtics responded to wider theories about selection No. 3 by keeping things simple....
lead_paragraph: With little mystery surrounding how the first two picks would go in Thursday's NBA draft, the Celtics responded to wider theories about selection No. 3 by keeping things simple.

headline.main: Celtics Resist Overtures, Pick Jaylen Brown With Third Pick
headline.print_headline: Celtics Resist Overtures, Pick Jaylen Brown With Third Pick
